New Records: This is only the second official clash between Malawi and Burundi, with their last meeting in 1987.
Key Match Events: Burundi have avoided defeats in their last few games, while Malawi's defense has been repeatedly breached this year.
Pre-Game Insights: Burundi are on a better run of form and feel confident, while Malawi's defensive issues could be a concern.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Malawi are ranked 126th in the world, while Burundi are 13 places adrift.
Others: This match is Malawi's opening fixture in the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations qualifiers.
